project_abstract.cdata: In addition to helping alleviate critical energy constraints, the Inner Mongolia Local Railway Project supports the Government's policy of encouraging local railway development. The project consists of the construction of a new 948km, single track line, running from Jining in central Inner Mongolia to Tongliao in the eastern part of the region. The line will connect at both ends with the national network. It will have an initial capacity of 7 million tons per year (per direction) and will be expanded as traffic builds up. Major components of the project are: (i) the construction of the railway line; (ii) the acquisition and installation of operational equipment; and (iii) the recruitment and training of staff to operate the railway. Related components include land acquisition and resettlement, and the development of the second-most important coal deposit in China, so far largely untouched.

P003543.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>内蒙古地方铁路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>除了帮助缓解能源紧张状况之外，本项目还支持中国政府实施鼓励地方发展铁路的政策。项目将在内蒙古中部集宁市至其东部通辽市之间新建一条948公里长单线铁路，将两市同国家铁路网连通。该铁路的初始运力为每年700万吨（单向），但随着运输量增长，运力将得到提升。项目的主要内容是：（1）铁路工程建设；（2）运行设备购置和安装；（3）铁路运营人员招聘和培训。相关内容包括征地和移民以及中国第二重要的煤矿床开发（目前，该煤矿床基本未开发）。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
